00011 extern struct MOUSETT mouseTT;
00012 extern BOOL mouseTTrender,mouseTTdone;

00014 const int   DL_Limited        = 1;
00015 const int   DL_Basic          = 2;
00016 const int   DL_Full                 = 3;
00017 const int   DL_Debug          = 4;

00019 void DisplayWeaponInfo( SOLDIERTYPE*, CHAR16*, UINT8, UINT8 );

00022 #define MAX(a, b) (a > b ? a : b)
00023 
00024 void SoldierTooltip( SOLDIERTYPE* pSoldier )
00025 {                 
00026       SGPRect           aRect;
00027       extern void GetSoldierScreenRect(SOLDIERTYPE*,SGPRect*);
00028       GetSoldierScreenRect( pSoldier,  &aRect );
00029       INT16       a1,a2;
00030 
00031       if ( gfKeyState[ALT] && pSoldier &&
00032             IsPointInScreenRectWithRelative( gusMouseXPos, gusMouseYPos, &aRect, &a1, &a2 ) )
00033       {
00034             MOUSETT           *pRegion = &mouseTT;
00035             CHAR16            pStrInfo[ sizeof( pRegion->FastHelpText ) ];
00036             int               iNVG = 0;
00037             INT16       sSoldierGridNo;
00038             BOOLEAN           fDisplayBigSlotItem     = FALSE;
00039             BOOLEAN           fMercIsUsingScope = FALSE;
00040             UINT16            iCarriedRL = 0;
00041             INT32       iRangeToTarget = 0;
00042             UINT8       ubTooltipDetailLevel = gGameExternalOptions.ubSoldierTooltipDetailLevel;
00043             UINT32            uiMaxTooltipDistance = gGameExternalOptions.ubStraightSightRange;
00044 
00045             // get the gridno the cursor is at
00046             GetMouseMapPos( &sSoldierGridNo );
00047 
00048             // get the distance to enemy's tile from the selected merc
00049             if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
00050                   iRangeToTarget = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->sGridNo, sSoldierGridNo ) / 10;
00051 
00052             if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableDynamicSoldierTooltips )
00053             {
00054                   for ( INT32 cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; cnt++ )
00055                   {
00056                         if ( Item[MercPtrs[gusSelectedSoldier]->inv[HANDPOS].usAttachItem[cnt]].visionrangebonus > 0 )
00057                         {
00058                               fMercIsUsingScope = TRUE;
00059                               break;
00060                         }
00061                   }
00062 
00063                   if ( fMercIsUsingScope )
00064                   {
00065                         // set detail level to (at least) Full
00066                         ubTooltipDetailLevel = MAX(DL_Full,ubTooltipDetailLevel);
00067                   }
00068                   else
00069                   {
00070                         // add 10% to max tooltip viewing distance per level of the merc
00071                         uiMaxTooltipDistance *= 1 + (MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->bExpLevel / 10);
00072 
00073                         if ( gGameExternalOptions.gfAllowLimitedVision )
00074                               uiMaxTooltipDistance *= 1 - (gGameExternalOptions.ubVisDistDecreasePerRainIntensity / 100);
00075 
00076                         if ( !(Item[MercPtrs[gusSelectedSoldier]->inv[HEAD1POS].usItem].nightvisionrangebonus > 0) &&
00077                                !(Item[MercPtrs[gusSelectedSoldier]->inv[HEAD2POS].usItem].nightvisionrangebonus > 0) &&
00078                                !DayTime() )
00079                         {
00080                               // if night reduce max tooltip viewing distance by a factor of 4 if merc is not wearing NVG
00081                               uiMaxTooltipDistance >>= 2;
00082                         }
00083 
00084                         if ( iRangeToTarget <= (INT32)(uiMaxTooltipDistance / 2) )
00085                         {
00086                               // at under half the maximum view distance set tooltip detail to (at least) Basic
00087                               ubTooltipDetailLevel = MAX(DL_Basic,ubTooltipDetailLevel);
00088                         }
00089                         else if ( iRangeToTarget <= (INT32)uiMaxTooltipDistance )
00090                         {
00091                               // at under the maximum view distance set tooltip detail to (at least) Limited
00092                               ubTooltipDetailLevel = MAX(DL_Limited,ubTooltipDetailLevel);
00093                         }
00094                         else
00095                         {
00096                               // beyond visual range, do not display tooltip if player has not chosen full or debug details
00097                               if ( ubTooltipDetailLevel < DL_Full )
00098                                     return;
00099                         }
00100                   } // fMercIsUsingScope is false
00101             } // gGameExternalOptions.fEnableDynamicSoldierTooltips
00102 
00103             swprintf( pStrInfo, L"" );
00104             if ( ubTooltipDetailLevel == DL_Debug )
00105             {
00106                   // display "debug" info
00107                   if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipLocation )
00108                         swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Location: %d\n", pStrInfo, sSoldierGridNo );
00109                   if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipBrightness )
00110                         swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Brightness: %d / %d\n", pStrInfo, SHADE_MIN - LightTrueLevel( sSoldierGridNo, gsInterfaceLevel ), SHADE_MIN );
00111                   if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipRangeToTarget )
00112                         swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Range to |Target: %d\n", pStrInfo, iRangeToTarget );
00113                   if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipID )
00114                         swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|I|D: %d\n", pStrInfo, pSoldier->ubID );
00115                   if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipOrders )
00116                         swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Orders: %d\n", pStrInfo, pSoldier->bOrders );
00117                   if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipAttitude )
00118                         swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Attitude: %d\n", pStrInfo, pSoldier->bAttitude );
00119                   if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipActionPoints )
00120                         swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Current |A|Ps: %d\n", pStrInfo, pSoldier->bActionPoints );
00121                   if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipHealth )
00122                         swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Current |Health: %d\n", pStrInfo, pSoldier->bLife );
00123             }
00124 
00125             // armor info code block start
00126             if ( ubTooltipDetailLevel >= DL_Full )
00127             {
00128                   if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipHelmet )
00129                         swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Helmet: %s\n", pStrInfo, pSoldier->inv[HELMETPOS].usItem ? ItemNames[ pSoldier->inv[HELMETPOS].usItem ] : L"No helmet" );
00130                   if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipVest )
00131                         swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Vest: %s\n", pStrInfo, pSoldier->inv[VESTPOS].usItem ? ItemNames[ pSoldier->inv[VESTPOS].usItem ] : L"No vest" );
00132                   if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipLeggings )
00133                         swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Leggings: %s\n", pStrInfo, pSoldier->inv[LEGPOS].usItem ? ItemNames[ pSoldier->inv[LEGPOS].usItem ] : L"No leggings" );
00134             }
00135             else
00136             {
00137                   if ( !(     !gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipHelmet &&
00138                               !gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipVest &&
00139                               !gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipLeggings) )
00140                         // do not display the armor line if all the armor toggles are set to false
00141                   {
00142                         if ( ArmourPercent( pSoldier ) )
00143                         {
00144                               swprintf( pStrInfo, L"|Armor: " );
00145                               if ( ubTooltipDetailLevel == DL_Basic )
00146                               {
00147                                     if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipHelmet )
00148                                           swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s%s", pStrInfo, pSoldier->inv[HELMETPOS].usItem ? L"helmet " : L"" );
00149                                     if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipVest )
00150                                           swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s%s", pStrInfo, pSoldier->inv[VESTPOS].usItem ? L"vest " : L"" );
00151                                     if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipLeggings )
00152                                           swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s%s", pStrInfo, pSoldier->inv[LEGPOS].usItem ? L"leggings" : L"" );
00153                                     wcscat( pStrInfo, L"\n" );
00154                               }
00155                               else // ubTooltipDetailLevel == DL_Limited
00156                               {
00157                                     swprintf( pStrInfo, L"|Armor: %s\n", L"worn" );
00158                               }
00159                         }
00160                         else
00161                         {
00162                               swprintf( pStrInfo, L"|Armor: %s\n", L"no armor" );
00163                         }
00164                   }
00165             }
00166             // armor info code block end
00167 
00168             // head slots info code block start
00169             if ( ubTooltipDetailLevel != DL_Debug )
00170             {
00171 
00172                   if( Item[pSoldier->inv[HEAD1POS].usItem].nightvisionrangebonus > 0 )
00173                         iNVG = HEAD1POS;
00174                   else if( Item[pSoldier->inv[HEAD2POS].usItem].nightvisionrangebonus > 0 )
00175                         iNVG = HEAD2POS;
00176 
00177                   if ( !(     !gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipHeadItem1 &&
00178                               !gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipHeadItem2) )
00179                         // do not display the NVG/mask lines if both head slot toggles are set to false
00180                   {
00181                         if ( ubTooltipDetailLevel >= DL_Full )
00182                         {
00183                               swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|N|V|G: %s\n", pStrInfo,
00184                                     iNVG ? ItemNames[ pSoldier->inv[ iNVG ].usItem ] : L"no NVG" );
00185                         }
00186                         else
00187                         {
00188                               swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|N|V|G: %s\n", pStrInfo, iNVG ? L"worn" : L"no NVG" );
00189                         }
00190                         swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Gas |Mask: %s\n", pStrInfo,
00191                               ( FindGasMask(pSoldier) != NO_SLOT ) ? L"worn" : L"no mask" );
00192                   }
00193             }
00194             else // gGameExternalOptions.ubSoldierTooltipDetailLevel == DL_Debug
00195             {
00196                   if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipHeadItem1 )
00197                         swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Head |Position |1: %s\n", pStrInfo, ItemNames[ pSoldier->inv[HEAD1POS].usItem ] );
00198                   if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipHeadItem2 )
00199                         swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Head |Position |2: %s\n", pStrInfo, ItemNames[ pSoldier->inv[HEAD2POS].usItem ] );
00200             }
00201             // head slots info code block end
00202 
00203             // weapon in primary hand info code block start
00204             if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipWeapon )
00205             {
00206                   DisplayWeaponInfo( pSoldier, pStrInfo, HANDPOS, ubTooltipDetailLevel );
00207             } // gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipWeapon
00208             // weapon in primary hand info code block end
00209 
00210             // weapon in off hand info code block start
00211             if ( gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipSecondHand )
00212             {
00213                   if ( pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS].usItem )
00214                   {
00215                         // if there's something in the slot display it
00216                         wcscat( pStrInfo, L"\n" );
00217                         DisplayWeaponInfo( pSoldier, pStrInfo, SECONDHANDPOS, ubTooltipDetailLevel );
00218                   }
00219             }
00220             // weapon in off hand info code block end
00221 
00222             // large objects in big inventory slots info code block start
00223             for ( UINT8 BigSlot = BIGPOCK1POS; BigSlot <= BIGPOCK4POS; BigSlot++ )
00224             {
00225                   if ( pSoldier->inv[ BigSlot ].usItem == 0 )
00226                         continue; // slot is empty, move on to the next slot
00227 
00228                   switch( BigSlot )
00229                   {
00230                         // if display of this big slot is toggled off then move on to the next slot
00231                         case BIGPOCK1POS:
00232                               if ( !gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipBigSlot1 )
00233                                     continue;
00234                               break;
00235                         case BIGPOCK2POS:
00236                               if ( !gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipBigSlot2 )
00237                                     continue;
00238                               break;
00239                         case BIGPOCK3POS:
00240                               if ( !gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipBigSlot3 )
00241                                     continue;
00242                             break;
00243                         case BIGPOCK4POS:
00244                               if ( !gGameExternalOptions.fEnableSoldierTooltipBigSlot4 )
00245                                     continue;
00246                               break;
00247                   }
00248 
00249                   if ( Item[ pSoldier->inv[ BigSlot ].usItem ].rocketlauncher )
00250                         iCarriedRL = pSoldier->inv[ BigSlot ].usItem; // remember that enemy is carrying a rocket launcher when check for rocket ammo is made later on
00251 
00252                   if ( (  Item[ pSoldier->inv[ BigSlot ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER ) ||
00253                          (    Item[ pSoldier->inv[ BigSlot ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN ) )
00254                   {
00255                         // it's a firearm
00256                         if ( (      Weapon[pSoldier->inv[ BigSlot ].usItem].ubWeaponClass != HANDGUNCLASS ) &&
00257                                (    Weapon[pSoldier->inv[ BigSlot ].usItem].ubWeaponClass != SMGCLASS ) )
00258                         {
00259                               // it's a long gun or heavy weapon
00260                               fDisplayBigSlotItem = TRUE;
00261                         }
00262                   }
00263                   else
00264                   {
00265                         // check for rocket ammo
00266                         if ( ( iCarriedRL != 0 ) &&                                                                     // soldier is carrying a RL ...
00267                                ValidLaunchable( pSoldier->inv[ BigSlot ].usItem, iCarriedRL ) ) // this item is launchable by the RL
00268                         {
00269                               fDisplayBigSlotItem = TRUE;
00270                         }
00271                   }
00272                   if ( fDisplayBigSlotItem )
00273                   {
00274                         wcscat( pStrInfo, L"\n(In Backpack) " );
00275                         DisplayWeaponInfo( pSoldier, pStrInfo, BigSlot, ubTooltipDetailLevel );
00276                         fDisplayBigSlotItem = FALSE;
00277                   }
00278             }
00279             // large objects in big inventory slots info code block end
00280 
00281             pRegion->iX = gusMouseXPos;
00282             pRegion->iY = gusMouseYPos;                     
00283 
00284 //          if ( gGameExternalOptions.ubSoldierTooltipDetailLevel == DL_Debug )
00285 //                swprintf( pRegion->FastHelpText, L"%s\n|String |Length|: %d", pStrInfo, wcslen(pStrInfo) );
00286 //          else
00287                   wcscpy( pRegion->FastHelpText, pStrInfo );
00288       }
00289 
00290       if ( gfKeyState[ ALT ] )
00291       {
00292             DrawMouseTooltip();
00293             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00294       }
00295 } // SoldierTooltip(SOLDIERTYPE* pSoldier)

00297 
00298 void DisplayWeaponInfo( SOLDIERTYPE* pSoldier, CHAR16* pStrInfo, UINT8 ubSlot, UINT8 ubTooltipDetailLevel )
00299 {
00300       const int   TriggerGroup            = 1026;
00301       const int   GunBarrelExtender = 310;
00302       const int   CMagAdapter556mm  = 1001;
00303       const int   CMagAdapter9mm          = 1002;
00304       INT32       iNumAttachments         = 0;
00305       BOOLEAN           fDisplayAttachment      = FALSE;
00306 
00307       if ( ubTooltipDetailLevel >= DL_Full )
00308       {
00309             // display exact weapon model
00310             swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Weapon: %s ", pStrInfo,
00311                   WeaponInHand( pSoldier ) ? ItemNames[ pSoldier->inv[ubSlot].usItem ] : L"no weapon" );
00312       }
00313       else
00314       {
00315             if ( ubTooltipDetailLevel == DL_Limited )
00316             {
00317                   // display general weapon class
00318                   switch( Weapon[pSoldier->inv[ubSlot].usItem].ubWeaponClass )
00319                   {
00320                         case HANDGUNCLASS:
00321                               swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Weapon: %s ", pStrInfo, L"handgun" );
00322                               break;
00323                         case SMGCLASS:
00324                               swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Weapon: %s ", pStrInfo, L"SMG" );
00325                               break;
00326                         case RIFLECLASS:
00327                               swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Weapon: %s ", pStrInfo, L"rifle" );
00328                               break;
00329                         case MGCLASS:
00330                               swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Weapon: %s ", pStrInfo, L"MG" );
00331                               break;
00332                         case SHOTGUNCLASS:
00333                               swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Weapon: %s ", pStrInfo, L"shotgun" );
00334                               break;
00335                         case KNIFECLASS:
00336                               swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Weapon: %s ", pStrInfo, L"knife" );
00337                               break;
00338                         default:
00339                               swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Weapon: %s ", pStrInfo, L"heavy weapon" );
00340                               break;
00341                   }
00342             }
00343             else
00344             {
00345                   // display general weapon type
00346                   swprintf( pStrInfo, L"%s|Weapon: %s ", pStrInfo,
00347                         WeaponInHand( pSoldier) ? WeaponType[Weapon[pSoldier->inv[ubSlot].usItem].ubWeaponType] : L"no weapon" );
00348             }
00349       }
00350 
00351       if ( gGameExternalOptions.ubSoldierTooltipDetailLevel >= DL_Basic )
00352       {
00353             // display weapon attachments
00354             for ( INT32 cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; cnt++ )
00355             {
00356                   if ( pSoldier->inv[ubSlot].usAttachItem[ cnt ] != NOTHING )
00357                   {     
00358                         if ( ubTooltipDetailLevel == DL_Basic )
00359                         {
00360                               // display only externally-visible weapon attachments
00361                               // don't display inseparable attachments such as the integral GLs on OICW & AICW
00362                               if ( !Item[pSoldier->inv[ubSlot].usAttachItem[ cnt ]].inseparable )
00363                               {
00364                                     if ( pSoldier->inv[ubSlot].usAttachItem[ cnt ] != TriggerGroup )
00365                                     {
00366                                           fDisplayAttachment = TRUE;
00367                                     }
00368                               }
00369                               else
00370                               {
00371                                     // display C-mags and barrel extensions
00372                                     switch( pSoldier->inv[ubSlot].usAttachItem[ cnt ] )
00373                                     {
00374                                           case GunBarrelExtender:
00375                                                 fDisplayAttachment = TRUE;
00376                                                 break;
00377                                           case CMagAdapter556mm:
00378                                                 fDisplayAttachment = TRUE;
00379                                                 break;
00380                                           case CMagAdapter9mm:
00381                                                 fDisplayAttachment = TRUE;
00382                                                 break;
00383                                           default:
00384                                                 break;
00385                                     }
00386                               }
00387                         }
00388                         else
00389                         {
00390                               // display all weapon attachments
00391                               fDisplayAttachment = TRUE;
00392                         }
00393                         if ( fDisplayAttachment )
00394                         {
00395                               iNumAttachments++;
00396                               if ( iNumAttachments == 1 )
00397                                     wcscat( pStrInfo, L"\n[" );
00398                               else
00399                                     wcscat( pStrInfo, L", " );
00400                               wcscat( pStrInfo, ItemNames[ pSoldier->inv[ubSlot].usAttachItem[ cnt ] ] );
00401                               fDisplayAttachment = FALSE; // clear flag for next loop iteration
00402                         }
00403                   } // pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usAttachItem[ cnt ] != NOTHING
00404             } // for
00405             if ( iNumAttachments > 0 )
00406                   wcscat( pStrInfo, pMessageStrings[ MSG_END_ATTACHMENT_LIST ] ); // append ' attached]' to end of string
00407       } // gGameExternalOptions.ubSoldierTooltipDetailLevel >= DL_Basic
00408 }

00410 MOUSETT mouseTT;
00411 BOOL mouseTTrender, mouseTTdone;

00413 void DrawMouseTooltip()
00414 {
00415       UINT8 *pDestBuf;
00416       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
00417       UINT16 usFillColor =    Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(250, 240, 188));
00418       UINT16 usRectColor1 =   Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 65, 57, 15 ) );
00419       UINT16 usRectColor2 =   Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 227, 198, 88 ) );
00420       static INT32 iX, iY, iW, iH;
00421       
00422       extern INT16 GetWidthOfString(STR16);
00423       extern INT16 GetNumberOfLinesInHeight(STR16);
00424       extern void DisplayHelpTokenizedString(STR16,INT16,INT16);
00425       extern BOOLEAN initTooltipBuffer();
00426       extern PTR LockTooltipBuffer(UINT32*);
00427       extern void UnlockTooltipBuffer();
00428       extern void DisplayTooltipString( STR16 pStringA, INT16 sX, INT16 sY );
00429       extern void j_log(PTR,...);
00430 
00431 //    if (!gGameExternalOptions.gfAllowSoldierToolTips) return;
00432 
00433             iX = mouseTT.iX;iY = mouseTT.iY;
00434             iW = (INT32)GetWidthOfString( mouseTT.FastHelpText ) + 10;
00435             iH = (INT32)( GetNumberOfLinesInHeight( mouseTT.FastHelpText ) * (GetFontHeight(FONT10ARIAL)+1) + 8 );
00436 
00437       if(1)//draw at cursor
00438       {
00439             iY -= (iH / 2);
00440             if (gusMouseXPos > (SCREEN_WIDTH / 2))
00441                   iX = gusMouseXPos - iW - 24;
00442             else 
00443                   iX = gusMouseXPos + 24;
00444             //if (gusMouseYPos > (SCREEN_HEIGHT / 2))
00445             //    iY -= 32;
00446 
00447             if (iY <= 0) iY += 32;
00448       }
00449       else
00450       {     //draw in panel
00451             //502,485 658,596   160*110 580,540
00452             iX = 580 - (iW / 2);
00453             iY = 540 - (iH/2);
00454             if (iY + iH > SCREEN_HEIGHT)  iY = SCREEN_HEIGHT - iH - 3 ;
00455       }
00456 
00457       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00458       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00459       RectangleDraw( TRUE, iX + 1, iY + 1, iX + iW - 1, iY + iH - 1, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 65, 57, 15 ) ), pDestBuf );
00460       RectangleDraw( TRUE, iX, iY, iX + iW - 2, iY + iH - 2, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 227, 198, 88 ) ), pDestBuf );
00461       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00462       ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, iX + 2, iY + 2, iX + iW - 3, iY + iH - 3 );
00463       ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, iX + 2, iY + 2, iX + iW - 3, iY + iH - 3 );
00464 
00465       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00466       SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00467       DisplayHelpTokenizedString( mouseTT.FastHelpText ,( INT16 )( iX + 5 ), ( INT16 )( iY + 5 ) );
00468       InvalidateRegion(  iX, iY, (iX + iW) , (iY + iH) );
00469 
00470       //InvalidateScreen();
00471 }
